text:
Heading: Market Research Analysis: Fin Tech-Enabled D2C Farm Products in Tamil Nadu, India
Subheading: Industry Overview
Tamil Nadu has a thriving agricultural sector, producing rice, pulses, dairy, and organic farm products. The shift toward digital transactions and direct farm-to-home models is opening new opportunities for farmers and consumers alike. Fin Tech-enabled D2C platforms facilitate financial inclusion, fair pricing, and improved logistics.
